name: tamako-photos
description: Photo management app with face detection

scripts.start:face-service: cd face_detection && set KMP_DUPLICATE_LIB_OK=TRUE && set PROTOCOL_BUFFERS_PYTHON_IMPLEMENTATION=python && "/c/Users/jiaha/anaconda3/envs/tensorflow/python.exe" face_service.py
scripts.stop:face-service: taskkill //F //IM python.exe 2>/dev/null || echo No Python processes to kill
scripts.clean: npm run stop && timeout /t 2 /nobreak >/dev/null && rmdir /S /Q node_modules 2>/dev/null && npm install
scripts.status: echo Checking service status... && tasklist //FI "IMAGENAME eq python.exe" 2>/dev/null && tasklist //FI "IMAGENAME eq electron.exe" 2>/dev/null
